trans-unit.target:
Maps are now available again on all sectors except Orion and Cygnus, which we expect to restore within 12-24 hours.
Sorry for the interruption of service. We'll have a more comprehensive report by noon tomorrow Pacific time.
Thank you for your patience.

Looking to add a Concussive Effect to your turrets? The new Frozen Token will stop attacking troops in their tracks! Enhance your Turrets with the Frozen Token to add the Concussive Effect to any of your turrets!
Open this Mystery Box for a chance to win the Frozen Token! Prizes also include Level 5 Frozen E-Lab Parts, Black Market Patches, Hacker’s Patches, Incendiary Cores, Generals SP 1000 and Troop Bundles!
This box will only be available for a limited time so be sure to pick one up and start freezing your enemy attacks today!

Greetings Commanders, The Edgeworld Community Team would like to remind all our fellow players that we have been working on the forum features: new content have been posted recently and there’s a lot more to come. Our intention is to treat the player community with the deserved care and attention, in order to get your involvement not only as gamers, but also as community participants. We will be giving answers to your troubles when needed, adding more useful information and posting new funny events to make the whole experience of playing Edgeworld something even more awesome! We sincerely hope to see you participating in these events and contests, there will be rewards and achievements for those who will join the forum activities. Commanders, this is the beginning of a new era in Edgeworld’s Forum! These are the links of the dedicated forums for each language: ENGLISH For more information click here GERMAN Für mehr informationen klicken sie hier SPANISH Para más información click aquí ITALIAN Per saperne di più clicca qui FRENCH Pour plus d'informations clique ici Regards, Edgeworld Community Team

Commander,
All Sectors on Edgeworld will require space maintenance tonight at 20:00 PST. Transmission is scheduled to resume by 20:30 PST.
Edgeworld

For a VERY limited time, the Black Market Patch will be available to purchase in the Shop! Visit the featured tab for your chance to pick one up!
The Black Market Patch will GUARANTEE upgrades to your Engineering Lab Parts up to Level 16 and 17!
This item will be featured at the low price of 225 Platinum and there is NO limit to the number you can buy! Stock up today!
